question:
During a recent plane journey, you sat next to a businessman who owns a chain of restaurants. He suggested you should contact him for a possible job opportunity. Write a letter to this businessman. In your letter: 
* remind him when and where you met 
* tell him what kind of job you are interested in 
* say why you think you would be suitable for this job
text: I am writing to introduce myself, I have seen you almost one year ago when I was travelling to Africa and I was next to you on the plane, you offered me a good job also I am really busy these days and I prefer to send a letter to you.

I really like to be a chef in a big restaurant because this position was one of my dreams, on the other hand, I can promote myself in this position, in fact, it was my father who was a chef and when I was a child I am used to going to the restaurant with my father.

I have been working in a small restaurant since five years ago, I think so I have enough experience for the position of chef, furthermore, In my opinion, I will be successful in this position, although, you do not have sufficient information about me please trust me.
I am looking forward to hearing your response.
